Package IntoTheGalaxy

Class Fighter

java.lang.Object
nl.han.ica.oopg.objects.GameObject
nl.han.ica.oopg.objects.SpriteObject
IntoTheGalaxy.Fighter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICollidableWithGameObjects, IKeyInput, IMouseInput, processing.core.PConstants
public class Fighter
extends SpriteObject
implements ICollidableWithGameObjects
A spaceship that can be controlled with the WASD keys and shoot Alien with the E key, can be hit by Alien and AlienRocket and loses a life, deleted from world if 3 lives are gone.

    • update

      public void update()
      Overrides GameObject.update(), keeps fighter within the screen, reduces delays over time.
      Specified by:
      update in class GameObject

    • keyPressed

      public void keyPressed​(int keyCode, char key)
      Control the fighter by using the WASD and E keys. The E key creates a FighterRocket object that can hit Alien.
      Specified by:
      keyPressed in interface IKeyInput
      Overrides:
      keyPressed in class GameObject
      Parameters:
      keyCode - The keycode
      key - The key

    • gameObjectCollisionOccurred

      public void gameObjectCollisionOccurred​(java.util.List<GameObject> collidedGameObjects)
      Implements the ICollidableWithGameObjects interface, can collide with Alien and AlienRocket. If fighter gets hit, it goes to the starting position and loses a life until it disappears from the world at 3 hits.
      Specified by:
      gameObjectCollisionOccurred in interface ICollidableWithGameObjects
      Parameters:
      collidedGameObjects - The GameObjects with which a collision should be detected

    • decreaseLives

      public int getNumLives()
      Returns the value of the numLives attribute.
